__e: You're asking me to turn against my neighbors to make enemies of men who've been my friends for years.
His parents were neighbors of my mother's.
- lt says what they think of you - the judge, doctor, even your parents' neighbours.
Those were your words, according to your neighbors.
What about the neighbors? You don't think they heard that gunshot?
The neighbours said he was a quiet young man who was often seen pushing the children on the swing set.
If the neighbor told you I was a policeman, it's not quite true. I retired a month ago.
What about the neighbors? You don't think they heard that gunshot?
You're cleared. Self-defence. The neighbours were great.
Well, the neighborhood's full of neighbors, and neighbors are full of curiosity, and, after all, I do...
No, Mr. Barrett. Your roommates are in the street.
Are all your neighbours like that?
But not men who were my neighbours and my friends.
They're next door at the Galbrands, and they said I'm in charge.
It's so much easier on the neighbors, on me, and on her.
And then the neighbors don't say anything.
Only when the neighbors are out.
